Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
The JSON of the first FAQ content is accessed by means of the faq_00001.xml file.

{
  "Category": [
    "faq/",
    "faq/silly/"
  ],
  "Date": 1577003400000,
  "GalleryTitle": "%(value:Question)",
  "Order": "950",
  "Paragraph": [
    {
      "Caption": "No. But iOs does.",
      "Image": {
        "Copyright": "CC0 Public Domain / Pixabay.com",
        "Image": {
          "link": "/.galleries/samples/53.jpg",
          "path": "/sites/default/.galleries/samples/53.jpg"
        }
      },
      "Text": "<p>Nam quam nunc ...</p>"
    }
	],
  "Question": "Do androids dream of electric sheep?"
}
